conbody.p:
In this lesson you learned some of the techniques used to define and customize workspaces:
Split a view.
Change to a different view: table and message log.
Swapping views by dragging one view over the other.
Edit the properties for a view: Select a query for the table, then filter it and add a threshold and title.
Save the workspace, making the new workspace the default for the Navigator item.
Edit the properties of the workspace to remove the default status.
